Function template not1

boost::compute::not1

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/compute/functional/logical.hpp>


template<typename Predicate> 
  unary_negate< Predicate > not1(const Predicate & predicate);

Description

Returns a unary_negate adaptor around predicate.

Parameters:

predicate

the unary function to wrap

Returns:

a unary_negate wrapper around predicate
